summary: A dutiful cop, guilt-ridden over saving the life of a gang leader, becomes obsessed with bringing down the crime syndicate of the man he saved.
cast: Daniel Wu|Nick Cheung|Shatina Chen|Kai Chi Liu|Ka Wah Lam|Andy On|Kwok-Lun Lee|Stephen Au|Kuan-Chun Chi|Ken Wong|Deep Ng|Sammuel Leung|Lam Tsing|Philip Keung|Astrid Chi Ching Chan|So-Bo Fung|Wu Ying-man|Singh Hartihan Bitto|Ken Ho-Ming Law|Ellen Liu
keywords: cop killed by a cop|police officer shot in the head|police officer shot in the back|police officer knocked unconscious|police officer shot in the chest
title: Moh ging
